parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.60

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Positions
</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Render Time Scope

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns an object's rendered position (z value above surface underneath) in render time scope. Same as [[getPosVisual]]

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>'''visiblePosition''' object

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]]: - name of the object

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - format [[PositionAGLS]]

  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>playerRenderedPos = [[visiblePosition]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[getPosVisual]], [[getPosATLVisual]], [[getPosASLVisual]], [[getPosWorldVisual]], [[visiblePositionASL]], [[position]], [[getPos]], [[getPosATL]], [[getPosASL]], [[getPosASLW]]
</value></part></template>


[[Category:Arma 2: Operation Arrowhead: New Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on February 4, 2015 - 17:04 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Pierre MGI|Pierre MGI]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
Z (visiblePosition select 2) works but if unit/object is in a building, Z remains at ground level. If you need Z depending on building floors/stages, use getPosAtl select 2 instead.
</dd>
</dl>
